hymn.title: Each time in the morning
hymn.category: Experience of Christ—As Food and Drink

lyrics.stanza: Each time in the morning, a while before dawn To You, Lord, I whisper a praise or a song, And feel Your life stirring so deep within me— My cup runneth over with joy!
And when at the noontime I'm hungry and worn And feel that the cares of this world have me torn, You come as my haven, my rest, and my food— My cup runneth over with joy!
And then in the evening when my thoughts are free, Remembr'ing that You, Lord, still dwell within me, This sweet fact releases a river in me— My cup runneth over with joy!
